messages.message: React Hook useCallback has a missing dependency: 'slides.length'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [currentSlide, goToSlide, slides.length]

messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
